hero.headline2: I AM RUNNING towards your perfect website.
hero.sub: People are constantly running after PRICE, QUALITY, and SPEED - they run to us. Under 30 minutes, $20-200, professional results.
hero.footer: Components are running together to form your site.

why.headline: Price. Quality. Speed. No compromises.
why.phrase: People are constantly running after better solutions — they run here because we deliver all three without the usual trade-offs.

price.title: Price Advantage
price.desc: $20–200 vs $500+ agencies. Keep your budget running lean.

speed.title: Speed Advantage
speed.desc: Under 30 minutes from idea to first draft. Sprint past the competition.

quality.title: Quality Advantage
quality.desc: AI-orchestrated components curated for pro results. No shortcuts.

evolution.headline: Running forward without stopping
evolution.phrase: A sprint from inspiration to execution. Every milestone keeps us running faster toward effortless web development.

genesis.title: Genesis
genesis.detail: Inspired by Bolt.ai to democratize site building.

lego.title: Lego System
lego.detail: 20 styles, 49 tags to keep components consistent.

ai.title: AI Orchestration
ai.detail: ChatGPT + Claude planning for component matching.

describe.title: Describe
describe.detail: Tell us what you need. Plain language, no jargon.

generate.title: Generate
generate.detail: AI assembles components that fit your style and goal.

customize.title: Customize
customize.detail: Drag, drop, and tweak. Ship in under 30 minutes.

showcase.headline: A catalog that keeps running
showcase.sub: 20 style variants and 49 curated tags keep your builds consistent and discoverable. Components are ready to sprint onto the canvas without breaking the pace.
showcase.tagline: Styled to run with any layout.
showcase.tagsSub: Smart filtering and AI matching ready.

pricing.sub: Keep budgets lean without sacrificing quality. Our triple advantage wins the race.
